Channel__c.VAR Campaigns: Partner-led campaign through Value Added Reseller - prospect likely working with a trusted technology advisor/consultant who recommended RingCentral
Channel__c.Content Syndication: Downloaded content from third-party sites - actively researching communication solutions, information-gathering stage
Channel__c.Email: Direct email outreach - may be cold or based on previous engagement, varying intent levels
Channel__c.Paid Search: Clicked on search ads - actively searching for communication solutions with high intent
Channel__c.Field Events: Attended in-person regional event - high engagement, relationship-building opportunity
Channel__c.Social Media: Engaged through LinkedIn/Facebook/Twitter - professional networking or content discovery
Channel__c.SIA: Strategic Industry Alliance partner referral - comes through trusted franchise/association partnership (e.g., RE/MAX, Century 21)
Channel__c.Appointment Setting: Pre-qualified by external SDR team - high-cost lead with scheduled meeting, expect prepared buyer
Channel__c.Corporate Events: Attended company-hosted event - brand awareness and relationship building
Channel__c.List Purchase: From purchased contact list - cold outreach, needs qualification
Channel__c.Affiliates: Referred through affiliate partner - has some context about RingCentral
Channel__c.Upsell: Existing customer expansion opportunity - knows product, exploring additional features
Channel__c.Sales Generated: Sales rep created contact from data provider - no direct prospect engagement yet
Channel__c.Vendor Qualified Leads: Pre-qualified by vendor partner - should have budget and timeline
Channel__c.Retargeting: Re-engaged after previous interaction - renewed interest in solution
Channel__c.Organic Search: Found us through organic search - self-directed research, comparing options
Channel__c.Direct Mail: Received physical mail - targeted outreach based on firmographic data
Channel__c.Referrals: Customer or partner referral - high trust, warm introduction

Type.Events: Event-based engagement - webinar, conference, or meeting attendance
Type.Meetings: Direct meeting campaign - focused on booking qualified conversations
Type.CPL_Content: Cost-per-lead content campaign - downloaded gated content
Type.Advertisement: Ad campaign response - varying intent based on ad type
Type.Email_Prospecting: Outbound email prospecting - cold to warm outreach
Type.Partners: Partner-generated lead - comes with partner context
Type.Partner Campaign: Joint campaign with partner - co-marketing effort
Type.Email_Nurture: Nurture email engagement - existing lead re-engaged

Intended_Product__c.RingEX: UCaaS/business phone system buyer - likely IT decision maker for unified communications
Intended_Product__c.Contact Center: Legacy contact center terminology - see RingCX
Intended_Product__c.RingCX: Contact center solution buyer - likely head of support/customer service operations
Intended_Product__c.RingSense: AI-powered conversation intelligence - interested in call analytics and coaching tools
Intended_Product__c.RingCentral Events: Virtual events platform - may need large-scale webinar capabilities

TCP_Theme__c.RingEX Upmarket Acquisition: Targeting Majors (500-4999) and Enterprise (5000+) for UCaaS - complex buying process
TCP_Theme__c.RingEX SMB Acquisition: Targeting small business (1-499 employees) - faster sales cycle, price sensitive
TCP_Theme__c.RingCX Acquisition: New contact center buyer - replacing or implementing first CC solution
TCP_Theme__c.RingCX Expansion: Existing customer adding contact center - upsell opportunity
TCP_Theme__c.Brand Acquisition: General brand awareness campaign - top of funnel
TCP_Theme__c.Vertical: Finserv: Financial services focused - compliance and security are key concerns
TCP_Theme__c.On-Prem To Cloud: Migrating from on-premise PBX - cost savings and modernization focus

TCP_Program__c.Greenfield: Ongoing evergreen campaign - continuous lead flow
TCP_Program__c.Integrated Campaigns + ABM: Account-based marketing - targeted approach for specific high-value accounts

Sub_Channel__c.Search Engines: SEM/SEO driven - paid or organic search

Sub_Channel_Detail__c.SEM - Non-Brand: Searched generic terms like 'business phone system' - comparing solutions
Sub_Channel_Detail__c.SEM - Brand: Searched 'RingCentral' or product names - brand aware, high intent
Sub_Channel_Detail__c.Target Accounts: ABM campaign for specific strategic accounts
Sub_Channel_Detail__c.Webinar Demo: Product demo webinar - evaluation phase, high intent
Sub_Channel_Detail__c.Field Event - CXO: Executive-level event - C-suite attendee, strategic conversation needed
Sub_Channel_Detail__c.Prospecting: Outbound prospecting campaign - various intent levels
Sub_Channel_Detail__c.SIA - Landing Page: Came through partner landing page - has partner context

Vendor__c.TechTarget: IT decision maker research site - technical buyer
Vendor__c.ZoomInfo: B2B contact database - sales prospecting tool
Vendor__c.Lusha: B2B contact finder - direct dials and emails

Vertical__c.Financial Services: Financial industry - security and compliance focus
Vertical__c.Government: Government sector - procurement process, security requirements
Vertical__c.Education: Education sector - budget constraints, E-rate eligible

Marketing_Message__c.Easily set up and grow my business: SMB messaging - simplicity and growth focus

Integrated_Marketing__c.MVP/PBX to Cloud: Migration from on-premise focus - cost savings pitch
Integrated_Marketing__c.UC+CC: Unified communications plus contact center bundle

Company_Size_Context.SOHO: 1-19 employees - price sensitive, needs simple solution
Company_Size_Context.Enterprise: 5000+ employees - strategic sale, long cycle, compliance critical
